FOSS+CyberSync Hackathon

Realistic problems are made for this hackathon for letting students know the real world scenarios.


Hosted on 26th March 2020, 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM

NOTE: Questions will be posted on 26th March 2020, 8:00 AM

Instructions:

        -   Do or execute all the programs locally on your system and check the efficiency by yourself.

        -   The first three lines of code must contain your Name, Roll.No in comments.

        -   You can submit the code any number of times, but the last submission will be taken.

        -   Submit the code to neerukondapuneeth@vardhaman.org

        -   Mailing format:

         =>   Subject            :    Program number and Name Eg: 1.Password Generator

                  Body                 :    Name, Roll.No Eg: A.Student, 17881A0500

                   Attachments :    Attach the code.

Directions

You can use Internet, but

  -   remember do not copy the programs.

  -   do not use the in-built functions or libraries which will finish the program in just few lines.

If you have any queries, contact

Akash - +91 7989763304
